data.name: Mori Carta
data.detailed_description:
Features
Deceptively simple controls: Almost every interaction in the game is handled with a simple swipe left or right.

Engaging story: Adventure with a colorful cast of characters that accompany you on your adventures.

Rich depth of builds and combos: Choosing cards to add to your deck will be critical in surviving your adventures. With over 600 cards, the combinations are endless.
Mori Carta has:
Five playable characters.
Five companions.
600+ playable cards.
Over 100 enemies.

data.short_description: This deck building roguelike has you discovering forgotten stories by swiping through decks of cards. Simple decisions lead to rich and rewarding adventures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
